== TroubleShooting/Debugging Process ==

There is more then one process that can be applied to the Troubleshooting/Debugging process.  If you know of one that is not documented please add it here.  Which process you use is not critical (assuming it's well documented and accurate) but applying it '''EVERY''' time you have to do Troubleshooting or Debugging is what is critical.

=== Examples of Troubleshooting processes ===
* 5 Step
* <nowiki>[[SevenStepTroubleShootingProcess|7 Step]]</nowiki> (Presented at Jaunty UDS)
* 10 Step
